description: Please kindly check carefylly the size of your pet before order  Different desinger's size is a little different . When your pet wear Size "M" doesn't mean all clothes's M size is fit your pet.  Please check its back length and neck length . And this coat design with VELCRO which can adjust its length about 3cm.
